feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Problem with PDF generation in SAP: address fields incorrectly defined as numeric
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I work with form processing in SAP Cloud ERP in conjunction with Adobe Livecycle Designer. I have now encountered a problem and hope you can help me.

I have created my own invoice form template based on the SAP standard invoice form template. This template requires two address blocks (ship-to-party and bill-to-party). The eight fields in the respective address blocks are text fields in which the binding of the respective business partner (bill-to-party or ship-to-party) has been provided with address lines 1-8.

After creating an invoice in the system, no PDF can be generated and I get an error message saying that this is a rendering problem. According to the error message, the fields (address lines 2-4 in the business partner) are declared as float, i.e., numeric, and therefore cannot be filled with alphanumeric values “string” (as is usual for an address).

However, since I need this option in order to be able to display Spanish addresses correctly, for example, I now need help.

If you need further information or screenshots, etc., please let me know! Otherwise, I would be grateful for any suggestions for a solution.

entry.title: Sales employee in Inquiry and Quotation
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Is there any options to take report of Sales quotation and Sales Inquiry with Sales employee. In Manage Sales Inquiry and Manage Sales Quotation there is no standard option to add the Sales employee field to filters and Settings in Public cloud. My client needs to track report of how many Quotation and details has been given by Sales employee's. Can you please guide me is there any solution for this or Why SAP has not given the Standard option to filter the Sales employee for Quotation and Inquiry.

Best regards,

Dinesh U

entry.title: How to enable API_FORM_PRINT_SRV in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
We would like to request activation of the standard API API_FORM_PRINT_SRV in our SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud tenant.

Business Context

After performing Goods Receipt, the user needs to generate and print HU labels for internal storage and identification purposes.

We have already designed a form template named YY1_EWM_HU_LABEL, based on the standard data source FDP_HU_SHIPPINGLABEL_SRV (Handling Unit Label).

This form needs to be rendered and printed directly from our custom Fiori app.

Requested Action

How to access to the API_FORM_PRINT_SRV service (part of SAP Forms Service by Adobe Integration API), or advise an equivalent successor API that allows:

Server-side rendering of the HU Label (Adobe Form).

Automatic release of the generated output to a print queue (e.g., HU_LABEL_Q) managed via Cloud Print Manager.

Optional retrieval of rendered PDF for preview via Fiori UI.

Business Process: Goods Receipt and Handling Unit Label Printing

Form Template: YY1_EWM_HU_LABEL (Data Source: FDP_HU_SHIPPINGLABEL_SRV)

Expected Behavior: Server-side PDF rendering and print queue integration for HU Label forms from a custom Fiori UI5 application

The API API_FORM_PRINT_SRV is not currently visible or available in our tenant under Communication Arrangements or SAP API Business Hub.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Field "Reference 1" in Upload Customer Open Items App.
entry.content:
Hi Experts!
I need your help with application Upload Customer Open Items - F4051.
System is SAP Public Cloud.

For Polish Standard Audit File purposes, SAP provided standard field "Reference 1", with technical ID "Reference1InDocumentHeader", where we can store important data for every invoice.


Because We have to maintain large number of FI invoices, We also need this field to be properly populated from excel template.
However Reference 1 is not available in that app, as  template cannot be extended by such technical ID.
Is there a way get this field somehow maintained in this scenario?

Thank you in advance!
Grzegorz

entry.title: 🤬 SAP Public Cloud: It's not a Bug, it's a feature not yet localized
entry.content:
Recently, SAP Support has started using a new phrase... "It's not a Bug, it's a feature not yet localized for xxx Country"

2 different instances that I faced recently:

  • RAP BO: I_BILLINGDOCUMENTTP Action CreateFromExternalData
    • Issue: Dump happens during Save phase
    • Reason: For Brazil, there are some mandatory field checks coded within the Billing Document Save that throws Messages, which RAP engine doesn't like, and thus results in a BEHAVIOR_ILLEGAL_STATEMENT dump.
    • Response: ......The localization of the 1Z6 scope item was carried out using the API with SOAP, and this process does not involve the I_BillingDocumentTP Business Object.....
  • RAP BO: I_PURCHASEORDERTP_2 Action Create
    • Issue: Delivery Address passed in the RAP BO by calling program, isn't considered for Tax calculation
    • Reason: The bug is identified in Class CL_TXS_FM_ADDRESS, method GET_ADDRESS_COMPLETE. The class is passing both address number & address handle to the function module ADDR_GET_COMPLETE, and this results in a Parameter_error Exception. The exception is happening because both parameters contain value. If address handle is populated, then only address handle must be passed to the function. If address handle is not populated, only then pass the address number. This requires a simple fix. A simple IF condition before the Function module call will avoid the Parameter_Error exception.
    • Response: ....However, since you are using a Z class for the creation of the Purchase Order, we cannot guarantee that the process will work properly, as the document creation flow is different. This also happens when using some Fiori Apps, such as Manage Purchase Order, for example....... I would like to emphasize that this is not a SAP bug, but rather a scenario that is not localized for Brazil, since in these contexts we are directly consuming an MM Core logic. If you use the localized VH Create Purchase Order - Advanced (ME21N), you won't face any issues.......

It is incredibly painful to get together enough people to vote on a request for a new API on Influence portal, since everyone who are working with Public Cloud, may not face the same requirement at the same exact time. And, until they face the issue, they may not bother to come to Influence portal and search for the request and vote on it. Even if we do all that, and gather enough votes and gather SAP's attention to put in a development request for the API, what I hear now is released APIs are still not to be trusted, because they may not be localized for a specific country or a specific scenario and it takes another Influence ticket in Localization Influence Portal, and the same chain of processes, for it to become useful.

What does released API even mean? Where on API hub is the documentation/list of localized APIs?

entry.title: How to change the setting of Key User Extensibility in the APP:Extensibility Settings
entry.content:
Dear Experts

I created a new UI Adaptation and want to use Export Software Collection to transfer it from the Develop environment to the Test environment.

When using Extensibility Settings to configure the transfer, I noticed that Key User Extensibility and Key User Development are set to OFF and NO, and both buttons are grayed out.

I now need to enable both to ON or YES, but I'm unsure which app to use and the specific steps involved.

 

Any insights or examples would be really appreciated.

Thanks!

YIN

entry.title: Problems with migration object Product - extend existing record by new org levels
entry.content:
Dear all,

I am in the migration phase in my project. I have created a separated project for the migration object Product - extend existing record by new org levels and tried to upload a file with several materials and plants, but I get an error message from the app. I made a test with 3 materials that need to be extended in 3 different plants, so I created 9 lines, each one with a different RUN ID. Only one line per material has been simulated correctly, the other lines have been skipped to avoid multiple updates on same target instance. 

Do I have to prepare one file per plant? Or is there another way to centralize all the records in one file?

Thank you in advance.

Best regards,

Ornella

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Error during Upload of Pages
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
i have the following issue when trying to upload pages in a new starter customizing tenant.
What i wanted to do, was export custom pages from a different tenant which is part of internal system environment and import them in a new starter customizing tenant for workshops.
The system tells me that the pages cant be uploaded and this is the error message:

I think the issue is, that the system i downloaded the pages from, has german as its original language and the starter customizing system usually have english as the original language. 

My question is, can i do anything to solve this ? I tried changing some language keys from "DE" to "EN" in the json file that is imported, but this only results in the same error but with the translation "English(EN)" instead of "German(DE)" (compare screenshot).
Where can i even check what the original language of the tenant is ?

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: Questions on EBS SAP Public cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts, 

We are encountering two issues in the Electronic Bank Statement process in SAP Public Cloud:

  1. We are unable to use document type ZR instead of SA.

  2. The system is not clearing entries automatically after uploading the bank statement. One entry posts correctly, but an additional entry is generated that debits and credits the clearing account. As a result, the amount in the main bank account remains uncleared.

entry.title: Need guidance on Bank reconciliation
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I am trying to understand the steps involved in bank reconciliation in SAP. I have already looked at the SAP Help Portal, but the documentation is quite overwhelming for me to read in detail.

Can anyone please break down the entire bank reconciliation process into simple blocks or steps?
A straightforward list or basic flow will be really helpful.
If you can also mention common tips or mistakes to avoid, that would be great.

Thank you in advance!

Best,

Nithin
